Package presentation.fsa

Class Summary
ArrowHead This is a filled polygon in the shape of an arrowhead.
BoundingBox TODO implement and use in SelectionTool and GraphDrawingView A rectangle used to select elements in a graph.
Edge The graphical representation of a transition in a finite state automaton.
EdgeHandler Visual representation of the control points for the bezier curve of an edge.
EdgeLayout  
GraphDrawingView The component in which users view, create and modify a graph representation of an automaton.
GraphElement  
GraphLabel TODO Change so that doesn't extend label; waste of space and rounds the location to int coords.
GraphModel Mediates between the Automaton model and the visual representation.
GraphView  
LatexLabel  
Node The graphical representation of a state in a finite state automaton.
NodeLayout
